message: Did you use BDD (Behavior-driven development)? What do you think about it? What is the tool(s) that you used?

data.message: I think the claims that the Customer can really be part of it is a hoax.. that could work a small project.. but not the average project. Instead an analyst might be involved in it, or better, just a way to connect your user stories to the code (in a more solid way). I used to use SpecFlow.. been awhile since I last did though :(

استخدمته في كورس من كورسيرا قبل كده .. اديت كويس في الكورس بس مكملتش بعد كده .. و رأيي فيه انه فكرة لذيذة جدا برغم انها تبدو مملة في الاول و التعود عليها صعب في الاول (بالنسبالي وقتها مكنتش حتي اشتغلت TDD و ﻻ كنت اعرف اي حاجة عن ال Testing ) 
ال tools اللي استخدمتها كانت 
Ruby , Rails , Rspec and Cucumber

I used Jasmine & felt that it was easier to read & write than xunit & similar libraries. I like Jasmine/RSpec/NSpec method than Cucumber & SpecFlow method.

Did anyone use BDD in a big project?
worked a little bit with SpecFlow in C#
